 2016-03982016-05-20,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  NRCAN,  NEB
ActNational Energy Board Act
National Energy Board Act Part VI (Oil and Gas) Regulations
SubjectIssuance of Licence GL-323 - Steelhead LNG (D) Inc.
PrecisOrder approving the ISSUANCE OF LICENCE GL-323 to Steelhead LNG (D) Inc. to export natural gas, in the form of liquefied natural gas, from a point at the outlet of the loading arm of natural gas liquefaction terminals which are anticipated to be located in the vicinity of Sarita Bay, near the Trevor Channel, British Columbia.
AttachmentsAttachment
